description: A quality classic tee made of 100% organic cotton – and boasting a little something extra to set it apart. Inspired by our passion for climbing, this eye-catcher steals the spotlight with a bold print stretching across the back. We like it – how about you?
name: Mammut Mammut Seon T-Shirt Original - Mens

specs.value: 95% organic cotton, 5% elastane - organic cotton elasthan knit
